Highlights

  • “Gee whiz, I sure do feel like a cow turd today. But hey, I guess that’s just life. Back to shoveling hay.” (Location 279)
  • George Orwell said that to see what’s in front of one’s nose requires a constant struggle. (Location 289)
    • Note: What does it mean? Understanding people is hard ?
